plot: The story is set in Areishia Spirit Academy, where girls from noble families are educated to become spirit contractors. A boy named Kamito, a male spirit contractor whose existence Was believed to be impossible, accidentally peeps on a girl named Clair while she was bathing, and forms a contract with the spirit she set her sights on. In order to make up for his mistake, Kamito must become Clair's contracted spirit.
opening_theme: "Kyōmei no True Force" (共鳴のTrue Force) by Hitomi Harada
ending_theme: "Blade Dance" (精霊剣舞祭＜ブレイドダンス＞) by Knee-Socks
